# Linked Perception (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, DF

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 117

*Your senses are muddied for a moment, but when they clear, your sight and hearing are improved.*

This spell imparts to all allies in its area a shared awareness of their surroundings. Each ally in the area (including yourself ) gains a +2 bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5 Spot and Listen) checks per each ally in the area. For example, if you and three allies are in the area, each of you gains a +6 bonus.
